DOC.brief_summary: This trial aim analyze whether resistive inspiratory manoeuvre ( RIM ) perform previously autogenic drainage ( AD ) technique improve effectiveness term mucus clearance typical bronchial drainage session adult , stable CF patient .
DOC.brief_title: Resistive Inspiratory Manoeuvre Airway Clearance Technique Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: It multicenter study . 4 different Spain Cystic Fibrosis Foundations include study ( Madrid , Valencia , Murcia Aragón ) . All patient perform three different arm treatment crossover randomization . Each arm treatment apply one session . The wash-out period one week . Before start trial , patient perform control session without intervention , outcome measure assess . During study period patient ' pharmacological treatment remain unchanged
DOC.criteria: Cystic Fibrosis ( CF ) diagnose ( establish genotype sweat sodium > 70 mmol/l sweat chloride > 60 mmol/l ) Clinically stable time study entry ( defined requirement antibiotic change respiratory medication precede 4 wk ) ; Chronic sputum production , least ≥ 15 ml /24h Familiar train use autogenic drainage technique ( least 6 month ) resistive inspiratory manoeuvre ( least three previous session ) To able provide write , informed consent Lung function : Forced expiratory volume 1 second < 30 % pred . ; Forced vital capacity < 40 % pred . Active haemoptysis previous month Supplemental oxygen noninvasive ventilation ( NIV )
